channel.title: Keras on Chris's Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Keras on Chris's Data Blog

item.title: Google -- Thank you for giving us Tensorflow and Keras...
item.description: First what is Deep Learning? Deep Learning. Uhhh… Hmmmm… Well… I know how to implement some of these deep(er) learning algorithms, but I’m just now getting my brain around how they work. My thinking is if I test my model on new data (data the model hasn’t seen) many times over and get good results (that are measurable and repeatable), what the heck do I care how the thing works under the hood?
